General.Name: Farglory Land Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Farglory Land Development Co., Ltd. operates as a construction company in Taiwan. The company builds, leases, and sells residential buildings and commercial buildings; invests in the construction of public buildings; and develops professional areas. The company was formerly known as Metropolitan Construction Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Farglory Land Development Co., Ltd. in December 2005. Farglory Land Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1967 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
